name: You'll Be Frustated
description:
Hi! I am Sayantan. I am just a 21 years old VR game enthusiast. I always wanted to purchase a real VR headset after I tried Google Cardboard VR. Since VR headsets are overpriced in my country, i.e., India and I had no savings (as I am still a college student of Physics), that dream of having a VR headset got real after two years.

After playing a few games on VR, I wanted to know more about developing games. I had basic knowledge of Coding as it was my optional subject in High School. Still, it was not enough to create a VR Game. I started learning about Unity and OpenXR and grasped it after two months of extensive research on YouTube and GitHub.

I had no plans of creating this game. I was just seeing whether I was able to successfully develop a locomotion system and grabbing system on VR. I have had another idea to create a much more entertaining game on Indian Mythology. But, after my locomotion system worked, I thought of creating this mini puzzle game just to try out things. 

I gave this to some of my beta testers and they said that it was good enough to be listed on stores. Since all good things comes with a cost, I am charging just $ 4.99 for it. If this game sells (though beta testers are praising my creation, I am a bit skeptical about it as all developers should be), it will a great help to me in creating the next big game about Indian Mythology.

I will update this game too with more puzzle levels as days pass.

(I will refund your money if you do not like the game after purchasing, just drop an email at rnsproductions@gmail.com)
